page.title: 19SCHOOL HOLIDAY ACTIVITIES
page.content: In the{school holidays}I do a lot of things. I usually go to North Wales with my family for a few days. At home I play games on our{computer.}I play the piano and spend some of my spare time practising. My friend lives nearby so I go to his house to play. Sometimes we go to Sanders Park to fish in the stream or we go to the swimming baths. Near where I live there is a school field and I go there to play cricket. I live in a quiet close, so I play games outside my house. I like to go to town to look in the shops. I like it when Boots have their computers on so that I can see the different games. There are plenty of things to do.
